coreAttributes.authorTag: A faint inscription underneath the bottle reads 'Distilled by DSG Foodstuffs LLC'
coreAttributes.name: Berry Soda
coreAttributes.description: An aluminum can of berry-flavored soda. The label on the can depicts an otter-boy in some swim trunks sitting on the bank of a river while drinking from a similar can.

useDescriptions.selfUse: After first opening the can, [npc.name] [npc.verb(bring)] the can of Berry Soda up to [npc.her] [npc.mouth]. A surprisingly authentic smell of nondescript berries rises from the opening, and as [npc.she] [npc.verb(tilt)] [npc.her] head back and [npc.verb(start)] drinking the fizzy liquid, [npc.she] [npc.verb(feel)] much more refreshed.
